definitions.definition: Clothes for wearing to bed and sleeping in, usually consisting of a loose-fitting shirt and pants/trousers.
examples: She put on a coat over her new pair of pajamas .

definitions.definition: Loose-fitting trousers worn by both sexes in various southern Asian countries including India .
The coloured uniform worn by players in professional limited overs matches.

main_definition: Clothes for wearing to bed and sleeping in, usually consisting of a loose-fitting shirt and pants/trousers.
secondary_definitions: Loose-fitting trousers worn by both sexes in various southern Asian countries including India .
( cricket , slang ) The coloured uniform worn by players in professional limited overs matches.
